section.title: Administration Guide
section.para: The OpenStack Dashboard is a web-based interface that allows you to manage OpenStack resources and services. The Dashboard allows you to interact with the OpenStack Compute cloud controller using the OpenStack APIs. For more information about installing and configuring the Dashboard, see the for your operating system.

listitem.para: To deploy the dashboard, see the .
To launch instances with the dashboard as an end user, see the in the OpenStack End User Guide.
To create and manage ports, see the section of the OpenStack End User Guide.
